---
name: Architecture / Module proposal
about: Describe this issue template's purpose here.
title: ""
labels: ""
assignees: ""
---

For:
– proposal for a new module (`lexorbital-module-xxx`),
– idea for structural changes (new convention, new manifest),
– overall design issues (not just a “small feature”).

Fields:

- Type of proposal:
  - [ ] New module
  - [ ] Meta-Kernel evolution
  - [ ] API/contract change
  - [ ] Other (specify)
- Description of the idea
- Problem or need it addresses
- Expected impact (core/modules/stack/docs)
- Risks/points of attention
- Diagram/schematic (optional but encouraged)
